title: Commons Minimal Api Items Schema
description: A schema for items that can be found at sharing platforms

url.description: direct link to the item on the platform or link to the platforms page

description.description: free human readable description of the item.

location.description: A GeoJson feature describing a location at which users can pick up items. important for simplicity: geometry can be null! Inspired by https://github.com/wielebenwir/commons-api/blob/master/commons-api.locations.schema.json#/definitions/location which refers to https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7946

anyOf.description: A GeoJson point, containing the coordinates of the location. This SHOULD be obfuscated/blurred if private data would otherwise be exposed.

reuseCategory.description: how can this item be received? is it for sale for rent or can it be borrowed for free? If 'depends' is chosen, there SHOULD be some explanation in the description of the item

policy.description: policy describing who can get access to this item. Might be thing specific or all the same on the item providing platform. anybody implies that no login is needed to contact the holder of the item, members only implies that you need a login, network/friends only implies that a login is needed and you might need to be added to a group of friends or another form of network to get access to the item, other indicates that there are other or mixed policies in place in order to get ahold of an item. If other is chosen there SHOULD be EITHER an explanation added to the description of the item on how to get ahold of the item OR it SHOULD be provided when following the url that links to the item

items.description: The items that can be found, bought, booked, borrowed, rented from your site.
